metadata.title: CVE-2024-35826 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:block: Fix page refcounts for unaligned buffers in __bio_release_pages()Fix an incorrect number of pages being released for buffers that do notstart at the beginning of a page.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
